5EV.SI.summary: Hosen Group Ltd., an investment holding company, engages in development, trading, and distribution of canned seafood products, canned fruits and vegetables, canned meat products, and chocolate products in Singapore, Malaysia, China, and internationally. It operates through two segments, House Brands and Non-House Brands. The company offers a range of fruits, vegetables, condiments, and beverages in can, bottle, and pouch packaging under the Hosen brand name; canned seafood, such as braised abalone and various types of shellfish under the Fortune brand name; canned meat and breakfast spreads under the Highway brand; western products under the LaDiva brand; and chocolate products with various contents packed in bottle, pouch, and tin under the Sincero brand. It is also involved in the importation, distribution, wholesale, and retail of household consumable goods; and trading of frozen and dried seafood related products. The company also exports its products. Hosen Group Ltd. was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Singapore.

8491.HK.summary: Cool Link (Holdings) Limited, an investment holding company, imports and supplies various food products to ship supply industry in Singapore, Cambodia, the Philippines, and Indonesia. It supplies various food products, including canned food and packaged beverages; and various dairy products, ice cream and frozen cakes, and pies. It serves ship supply customers, and retail and food service customers. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Singapore. Cool Link (Holdings) Limited is a subsidiary of Packman Global Holdings Limited.

K03.SI.summary: Khong Guan Limited, an investment holding company, trades in wheat flour and other edible products in Singapore and Malaysia. It is involved in the wholesale of wheat flour, biscuits, general goods, and other consumer goods. The company also trades in shares listed primarily in Singapore and Malaysia. It also exports its products to approximately 30 countries worldwide. The company was formerly known as Khong Guan Flour Milling Limited and changed its name to Khong Guan Limited in November 2016. Khong Guan Limited was incorporated in 1960 and is headquartered in Singapore.

O32.SI.summary: Olam International Limited engages in the sourcing, processing, packaging, and merchandising of agricultural products worldwide. It operates in five segments: Edible Nuts and Spices; Confectionery and Beverage Ingredients; Food Staples and Packaged Foods; Industrial Raw Materials, Infrastructure and Logistics; and Commodity Financial Services (CFS). The Edible Nuts and Spices segment offers cashews, peanuts, almonds, hazelnuts, pistachios, walnuts, and sesame, as well as beans, including pulses, lentils, and peas; and spices and vegetable ingredients, such as pepper, onion, garlic, capsicums, and tomato, as well as tropical spices, chilies, and specialty products. The Confectionery and Beverage Ingredients segment provides cocoa and coffee products. The Food Staples and Packaged Foods segments offers rice, sugar and sweeteners, grains and animal feed, edible oils, dairy products, and packaged foods. The Industrial Raw Materials, Infrastructure and Logistics segment offers cotton, wood products, rubber, fertilizers, and infrastructure and logistics services. The CFS segment provides risk management, market-making, volatility and asset management, trade, and structured finance solutions. Olam International Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Singapore.
